author: pierred
msg: - standard-1.0.x is now a branch: STANDARD_1_0_BRANCH
- modified the build so it compiles with the new
- c.tld is now the 1.1 TLD (pretty much a copy of c-rt.tld
- removed some of the <c:out> which do not depend on default
- no more usage of the ExpressionEvaluator since we now
get it for free from JSP 2.0.

author: pierred
msg: findMatch(String basename, Locale pref) did not take into account the fact
that an exact match could fail because of the variant, and not necessarily
because of the country. For example, finding "es_ES" for an available locale
would be rejected when the preferred locale was "es_ES_foo".
It should not be rejected and this is now fixed.

author: pierred
msg: We take advantage of URLEncoder.encode(String,String) if running on J2SE 1.4.
